articles.description: Prince Harry and Meghan have reportedly been invited to the Queen's birthday parade in June, with the monarch looking to get the royal calendar back on track in the coming months
articles.content:
The Queen has reportedly invited Prince Harry and Meghan to her 95th birthday in what would be the first reunion since they stepped down from royal duties.

articles.description: Eclectic director of documentaries and feature films, from Seven Up! to James Bond
articles.content:
